Headline: Temporary #124 Navy Pier Reroute near State/Hubbard
ShortDescription: 124 Navy Pier buses temp. rerouted near State/Hubbard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#124 Navy Pier buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near State/Hubbard. 

Westbound buses will operate via Grand, State, Hubbard, Clark, Wacker, State, Madison, and resume normal route.

Eastbound buses will operate via Washington, State, Wacker, Dearborn, Illinois, Columbus, and resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Jackson/California
ShortDescription: Eastbound 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, California, Madison, Western and Jackson near Jackson/California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Eastbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, California, Madison, Western, Jackson and over regular route, due to street blockage near Jackson/California.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #78 Montrose Temporary Reroute near Montrose Beach
ShortDescription: 78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Montrose Beach, due to earlier 5k run near Montrose Beach.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Montrose Beach, due to earlier 5k run near Montrose Beach.

Eastbound buses will operate via Wilson, Marine and line cut.

Westbound buses will operate via Marine, Wilson and line cut.

Clean up crews are working to restore service.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Delayed at California
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at California due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at California due to police activity.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/major delays following earlier police activity at 95th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/major delays following earlier police activity at 95th. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Shuttle buses are still available between Garfield and 95th.

Allow extra travel time.
